title: Blacksmith Scene
plot: Three men hammer on an anvil and pass a bottle of beer around.
fullplot: A stationary camera looks at a large anvil with a blacksmith behind it and one on either side. The smith in the middle draws a heated metal rod from the fire, places it on the anvil, and all three begin a rhythmic hammering. After several blows, the metal goes back in the fire. One smith pulls out a bottle of beer, and they each take a swig. Then, out comes the glowing metal and the hammering resumes.

title: The Great Train Robbery
plot: A group of bandits stage a daring train robbery, only to be pursued by a determined posse.
fullplot: The film opens with two bandits breaking into a railroad telegraph office, where they force the operator to make the approaching train stop. As the train stops, it is boarded by the bandits - now four. Two bandits enter an express car, kill a messenger and open the safe with dynamite. The others kill the fireman and force the engineer to stop the train and uncouple the locomotive. The bandits then rob the passengers of their belongings and escape. In the final scene, the leader of the bandits is depicted shooting at the camera.

title: The Impossible Voyage
plot: A group of explorers travel to the sun in a bizarre vehicle.
fullplot: A society of explorers, members of the Institute of Incoherent Geography, plan a trip to the sun. Their leader, Engineer Mabouloff, has designed a special vehicle for this purpose, an airship equipped with compartments for ice and refrigeration. After a launching ceremony, the airship takes off with several scientists aboard and flies into space. They pass various celestial bodies and eventually reach the sun, which has a face and seems to swallow the ship. The explorers land and find the sun's surface to be a strange, fiery landscape. The heat becomes unbearable, forcing them to retreat into their ship's ice compartment. They then fall into a solar ocean, and eventually, their ship is shot out of a solar flare back to Earth, landing in the sea. They are rescued by sailors and return home to great acclaim.

title: The Life of an American Fireman
plot: Shows the daily life of a fireman, culminating in a dramatic rescue.
fullplot: The film depicts the sleeping quarters of a fire station. A fireman dreams of a woman and child. The scene shifts to a closeup of a fire alarm box. A hand activates the alarm. The firemen slide down the pole, and horse-drawn fire engines are dispatched. The film then shows an interior scene of a burning house where a woman is trapped. A fireman enters through the window and carries her out. He re-enters to rescue a child. The final scene shows the exterior of the burning building as the rescue unfolds.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
fullplot: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank Penitentiary. He is befriended by Ellis "Red" Redding, an inmate serving a life sentence. Red procures a rock hammer and later a large poster of Rita Hayworth for Andy. Over the years, Andy uses his banking skills to gain favor with the prison staff, doing their taxes and financial planning. He also helps the warden launder money from illicit schemes. Andy dreams of escaping to a Mexican coastal town. After nearly two decades, Andy disappears from his cell. The warden discovers a tunnel Andy dug with the rock hammer, concealed behind the poster. Andy, having escaped, exposes the warden's corruption and flees to Mexico. Red eventually gets paroled and, following Andy's instructions, finds him in Zihuatanejo.
writers: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption")

awards.text: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 33 nominations.
